original_text:
Your rigging hangs loose:
    The mast is not held secure,
    the sail is not spread.
Then an abundance of spoils will be divided
    and even the lame will carry off plunder.
korean_text: 네 돛대 줄이 풀렸으니 돛대의 밑을 튼튼히 하지 못하였고 돛을 달지 못하였느니라 때가 되면 많은 재물을 탈취하여 나누리니 저는 자도 그 재물을 취할 것이며

sentences.original_text: The mast is not held secure
Then an abundance of spoils will be divided
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때 많은 전리품이 나뉘게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: even the lame will carry off plunder
